title: Remove IgnoreAcceptDocsQuery
description: While reviewing how queries apply acceptDocs, I noticed that Solr has org.apache.solr.search.join.IgnoreAcceptDocsQuery, but it looks unused. Should we remove it?

comments.author: Adrien Grand
comments.content: I'll remove it shortly if there are no objections.

comments.author: ASF subversion and git services
comments.content:
Commit 1692067 from Adrien Grand in branch 'dev/branches/branch_5x'
[ https://svn.apache.org/r1692067 ]

SOLR-7715: Removed IgnoreAcceptDocsQuery.

comments.author: Adrien Grand
comments.content: There also was a commit on trunk but I wrongly labeled it as LUCENE-7715 instead of SOLR-7715: http://svn.apache.org/r1692062
